TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProcessInputEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.NotifyInputEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for postprocess input events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Process input events enable access to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager> staging area.
The input staging area processes raw input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] events.
ProcessInputEventArgs is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](../Token/TLA2%23tla_winclient_md.md)] in the follow stages:
1. Pre-process stage. The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
2. Pre-notify stage. The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
3. The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](../Token/TLA2%23tla_winclient_md.md)] input event or events are raised.
4. Post-notify stage. The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
5. Post-process stage. The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem PeekInput() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets, but does not pop, the input event on the top of the staging area stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The return value will be `null` if the staging area is empty.

Docs.permission: for getting the top input. Associated enumerations:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem PopInput() cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes the input event off the top of the staging area stack.
Docs.permission: for popping an input event. Associated enumerations:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem PushInput(class System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem input) cil managed

Docs.param: The input event to put on the staging area stack.
Docs.summary: Puts the specified input event onto the top of the staging area stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `input` cannot be `null` and it cannot already exist in the staging area.

Docs.permission: for pushing an input event. Associated enumerations:

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem PushInput (System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs input, System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem promote);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem PushInput(class System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs input, class System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem promote) cil managed

Docs.param: The input event to put on the staging area stack.
An existing staging area item to promote the state from.
Docs.summary: Puts the specified input event onto the top of the specified staging area stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `input` cannot be `null` and it cannot already exist in the staging area.

Docs.permission: for pushing an input event. Associated enumerations:
